name: TU LAN CAVE – 1 DAY ADVENTURE
description: One day tour to Tu Lan Caves System is for anyone who would like to explore the nature, jungle, untouched caves with limited of time. This tour will offer tourist chance to experience the primary forest, Chuot (Rat) cave, trekking uphill from Laken valley (elevation: 150m) to Hung Ton valley, explore Hung Ton dry cave and experience the ladder with 10m vertical drop, swimming 100m in the darkness of Hung Ton river cave. This tour will bring you unique caving and trekking experiences.
